Reviews.Title: Excellent phone!
Reviews.Author: Jaime
Reviews.Content: Bought it to send to Venezuela where it was tested on every band suggested by the manufacturer and worked great, don't expect any ultra durable Iphone or Samsung galaxy materials here, this phone is rather plastic-y and might require lots of tender-loving-care not to brake, but the screen played great every movie and picture was taken, and the buttons and controls worked as expected. Great phone overall for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: angel rivas
Reviews.Content: It is a great phone. good cost and performance ratio.good processing speed. good pictures and video. the headset sound is clear.

Reviews.Title: compatible with consumer cellular, however
Reviews.Author: susan marusic
Reviews.Content: I can not do MMS functions only voice, text, data access!  I am now not recommending this phone if you are a consumer cellular customer.  I gave it 5 stars, but I would like to adjust it down to 3 because of this.  Not  necessarily Huawei's fault, more of a problem with consumer cellular.  Consumer cellular uses AT&t; tower which makes these types of phones compatible with their service.  But as I said, it's limited compatibility.  If you have consumers, stick with their smart phones that are tweaked for full support.

Reviews.Title: Greatest purchase I ever made.
Reviews.Author: julio lonnie lopez
Reviews.Content: First of all, I got this phone fast in the mail and it was real easy to set up. I have ATT with a data plan already and have been out of contract for the past 2 months.  My plan was to never get back into contract again with anyone so I bought this phone, hoping it would fulfill my dream of freedom.  And it has in spades.  The phone is great, snappy fast, and worked with my SIM card and my plan without having to change anything, except for ATT charging a $1 fee for changing phones, sneaky.This phone is a gateway phone, hopefully it will teach the American consumer that you don't need to have a subsidized phone in order to have a good.  That you don't need to be locked into a contract or a company for that matter.  Freedom!

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: Victor Ndu
Reviews.Content: Nice phone, does what it says on the tin but I wish the packaging was a bit better described in the ad. i.e the ad could have said slighty opend Canada Bell packaging. Nevertheless the phone look new. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Nice phone - until it broke
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Marissa"
Reviews.Content: The phone is the same size and look as an iphone 4.  The weird thing is that all the buttons are opposite of what they are on other android phones I have used. It does not make alot of noise when ringing so if you need a loud phone this is not for you.  Responsive.Then I put the headset in.  It never worked again without the headphones plugged in.  Had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: L. J. B. Philander
Reviews.Content: Great smartphone fits well in your hand lots of extras already downloaded on phone. I would recommend to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Arlenis Venezuela
Reviews.Author: Arlenis Blanco G.
Reviews.Content: Good and finally the long wait I received the computer, as been found is seen to be a good team but it's too early to comment as to the operation if we just have hours to hoping I do not have any problems, but my comment is promoted and what you buy and when you receive something missing, as indicated that comes with headphones and it was not packaged or delivered, and sent blue color when black was requested to indicate in the amazon page should be very careful when you go to market and sell to release the request for that reason I give one star.

Reviews.Title: Very good budget phone
Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: This phone is able to do Skype,Facebook,Whats Apps etc. I am so able to listen to my radio stations...The phone has Google Play preloaded and access to your favorite apps are right at your finger tips.The only draw back with this phone is that when WIFI is on and other apps are running concurrently like Facebook etc the battery drains easily so it will not be able to last for the entire day without charging.. walk with your charger.There is a slot for your microsd chip, the phone is unlocked.Overall I was glad I bought this phone.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Carlos Yeguez
Reviews.Content: I liked because it was very fast and secure. Thank you very much i will be in touch for others buys.

Reviews.Title: I am not satisfied
Reviews.Author: YennyPena
Reviews.Content: the phone is good but I came to Venezuela and the operating system is in English and not in French Spanish to other equipment not up to the telephony network 3g Digitel in Venezuela working in the frequency band 900 network

Reviews.Title: Bad bad!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: I do not work on 3G networks, GSM only. Not unlocked for it! Since buy a team supposedly factory unlocked.

Reviews.Title: bad provider.
Reviews.Author: Xiomar Lopez
Reviews.Content: the vendor provides a product that does not meet the describidas feature.offers band 3G 850/1900 and sends you 3g 900/2100.the provider does not know the characteristic equipment offered.the provider ESON-AM is a fraud.

Reviews.Title: all good
Reviews.Author: luis morales
Reviews.Content: all good product came in perfect condition and at the right time and the excellent quality and a fair price

Reviews.Title: Works in China
Reviews.Author: William "BillK"
Reviews.Content: I bought it for travel in China. It works well. Uses a Mini Sim card. Has memory expansion slot. Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: observation
Reviews.Author: Vanessa Rondon
Reviews.Content: i didn't like the phone because it doesn't work with 3g in my country, i tried with two cell phones companies and i am dissapointed

Reviews.Title: Didn't work with my simcard
Reviews.Author: Paul Fulda
Reviews.Content: I bought this based on the description that it was new and unlocked, and would work with USA T-mobile simcards (though I was aware that 3G was not supported). It did not work with my USA T-mobile simcard, and to all appearances seemed to still be locked to an Australian network called Telstra. I returned it soon after, and thankfully that process went smoothly.

Reviews.Title: did not work with sim card had to return
Reviews.Author: JOHN MULVANYSISSY
Reviews.Content: Tried to use it with Consumer Cellular but it would not recognize the sim card. H ad to return it.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: Very nice brand new team in its case. 100% satisfied with the purchase. Unlocked H + and running on smoothly.

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Battery for BB
Reviews.Content: Good price, i reccomend this equipment for you, really it have functions simple and easy drive, ok, ok, ok, this phone.

Reviews.Title: no flash or front camera as explained in the descriptio
Reviews.Author: Yosely Quintero
Reviews.Content: no flash or front camera as explained in the description!!!!It is not just the way the picturethe rest very well !!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Alicia M.
Reviews.Content: It really works well . It has a cool feature which connects to wi fi automatically ( my data will stop and WLAN connects ) it easy to us . Very simple . The camera could be better but it's ok . The radio plays clear . The price was unbeatable  .

Reviews.Title: Works well.
Reviews.Author: Old Timer
Reviews.Content: This phone is being sent to the Philippines for my sister in-law.We needed a phone that would do skype and Yahoo messenger and facebook.It work well for what we need. Hve not tried it with sims card. But have used the wifiwith no problem.So we are pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Product says come with flash and draw him, instead of 4GB brings a 512MB
Reviews.Author: patricia rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Product says come with flash and draw him, instead of 4GB brings a 512MB no cumple con las especificaciones prometidas
